topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## Hello World

A minimal example plugin demonstrating core Clubhouse plugin APIs. Use this as a starting point for building your own plugins.

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**Persistent Counter** — Click the button to increment a counter. The value is stored in project-local storage and survives restarts.

**Notifications** — Each increment triggers a notification, demonstrating the notification API.

**Logging** — Actions are logged to the plugin console for debugging.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

Available from the command palette:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Say Hello** | Triggers a greeting notification |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Demonstrate the logging API |
| **storage** | Persist the counter value across sessions |
| **notifications** | Show greeting notifications |
| **commands** | Register the Say Hello command |
| **theme** | Adapt colors and styles to the current theme |
